articles.title: Huobi Global: Who Is Crypto Entrepreneur Justin Sun? - Bloomberg

articles.title: Tens of thousands of electric bikes recalled, 2 sisters' deaths blamed on them - WWMT-TV
articles.description: There's important information for the owners of tens of thousands of electric bikes. Stop using and charging them, because they're being recalled.

articles.title: Silver outshining gold; sees best monthly gains in more than two years as prices push above $24 - Kitco NEWS
articles.description: (Kitco News) - A shift in risk sentiment, coupled with a weak U.S. dollar and growing expectations that the Federal Reserve will cut interest rates in the second half of the year, is propelling silver prices higher, and the precious metal is outshining gold.
